…legacy alongside my sorors--Congresswomen Yvette Clarke,  Valerie Foushee, Stacey Plaskett, Lucy McBath, Jasmine Crockett, Summer  Lee, Jennifer McClellan, and Senator Angela Alsobrooks--leading in  social action, protecting voting rights, education, economic justice,  and housing.

Mr. Speaker, to Deltas across the world, I say Happy Founders Day.

…legislation  was written--but, actually, because of something that went back to the  Truman years--there is some suggestion that is a disability.
